meanings.sent1: She decided to retinted her hair a darker shade.
meanings.sent2: The artist retinted the sky to make it more vibrant.
meanings.sent3: After the mishap, she had to retinted her painting to fix the mistake.
meanings.sent4: The sunset retinted the sky with hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The gardener retinted the flowers to match the new color scheme of the garden.

meanings.sent1: The retinted car looked as good as new.
